name.title: Source name
name.description: The name of the source to produce notifications

timeWindow.title: Time window
timeWindow.description: Time window for notifications to potentially be sent out over

dataVolume.title: Data volume
dataVolume.description: Data volume threshold above which a notification is triggered. Accepts numerals with units (bytes, KB, MB, GB, etc.), such as 4GB. The default unit is bytes.

notifyOnResolution.title: Only notify on start and resolution
notifyOnResolution.description: Send notifications only when condition starts and resolves. Disable to send notifications for every event.
